HTMLElementMscandidatewindowupdate_event.summary: The mscandidatewindowupdate event is thrown after the Input Method Editor (IME) candidate window has been identified as needing to change size, but before any visual updates have rendered.

remarks.para: This proprietary method is specific to Internet Explorer.
